column1: Smoque BBQ////The place is always packed
column2: so you may be standing in a small to rather large line.  One time
column3: we had called in an order to pick up at 5:30pm
column4: but they told us it wouldn't be ready till 7pm.  When we got there
column5: the line was out the door and around the side of the building.  I was so glad we called for take out
column6: but I would have stood in line for this barbecue.
